sentences: Werner Knudsen (born 23 October 1953) in Ringsted) is a Danish computer scientist, composer and author of both choral music and IT books.
He is an IT architect at IBM and used to work at TDC A/S. He lives in Glostrup close to Copenhagen.
His Sommersange, a choral cycle with lyrics by Th√∏ger Larsen, has been published at Edition S in 2008.
